00185   ptsLen = pts.size();

00187   for(int i = 0;i < ptsLen; i+=3) {
00188     if( (pts[i] > 0.0) &&
00189         (pts[i+1] > 0.0)  
00190         && (pts[i+2] > 0.0) &&
00191         ( ((unsigned int)(pts[i]*((double)(1u << maxDepth)))) < (1u << maxDepth))  &&
00192         ( ((unsigned int)(pts[i+1]*((double)(1u << maxDepth)))) < (1u << maxDepth))  &&
00193         ( ((unsigned int)(pts[i+2]*((double)(1u << maxDepth)))) < (1u << maxDepth)) ) {
00194       tmpNodes.push_back( ot::TreeNode((unsigned int)(pts[i]*(double)(1u << maxDepth)),
00195             (unsigned int)(pts[i+1]*(double)(1u << maxDepth)),
00196             (unsigned int)(pts[i+2]*(double)(1u << maxDepth)),
00197             maxDepth,dim,maxDepth) );
00198     }
00199   }
00200   pts.clear();
00201 
00202   par::removeDuplicates<ot::TreeNode>(tmpNodes,false,MPI_COMM_WORLD);   
00203   linOct = tmpNodes;
00204   tmpNodes.clear();
00205   par::partitionW<ot::TreeNode>(linOct, NULL,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00206   // reduce and only print the total ...
00207   localSz = linOct.size();
00208   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&localSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00209   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00210   if(rank==0) {
00211     std::cout<<"# pts= " << totalSz<<std::endl;
00212   }
00213   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00214 
00215   pts.resize(3*(linOct.size()));
00216   ptsLen = (3*(linOct.size()));
00217   for(int i = 0; i < linOct.size(); i++) {
00218     pts[3*i] = (((double)(linOct[i].getX())) + 0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00219     pts[(3*i)+1] = (((double)(linOct[i].getY())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00220     pts[(3*i)+2] = (((double)(linOct[i].getZ())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00221   }//end for i
00222   linOct.clear();
00223   gSize[0] = 1.0;
00224   gSize[1] = 1.0;
00225   gSize[2] = 1.0;
00226

00229 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00230   PetscLogStagePush(stages[0]);
00231 #endif
00232   startTime = MPI_Wtime();
00233   ot::points2Octree(pts, gSize, linOct, dim, maxDepth, maxNumPts, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00234   endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00235 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00236   PetscLogStagePop();
00237 #endif
00238   localTime = endTime - startTime;
00239   par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&localTime, &globalTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00240   if(!rank){
00241     std::cout <<"P2n Time: "<<globalTime << std::endl;
00242   }
00243   // reduce and only print the total ...
00244   localSz = linOct.size();
00245   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&localSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00246   if(rank==0) {
00247     std::cout<<"# of Unbalanced Octants: " << totalSz<<std::endl;
00248   }
00249   pts.clear();
00250 
00251   //Balancing...
00252   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00253 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00254   PetscLogStagePush(stages[1]);
00255 #endif
00256   startTime = MPI_Wtime();
00257   ot::balanceOctree (linOct, balOct, dim, maxDepth, incCorner, MPI_COMM_WORLD, NULL, NULL);
00258   endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00259 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00260   PetscLogStagePop();
00261 #endif
00262   linOct.clear();
00263   // compute total inp size and output size
00264   localSz = balOct.size();
00265   localTime = endTime - startTime;
00266   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&localSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00267   par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&localTime, &globalTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00268 
00269   if(!rank) {
00270     std::cout << "# of Balanced Octants: "<< totalSz << std::endl;       
00271     std::cout << "bal Time: "<<globalTime << std::endl;
00272   }
00273 
00274   //Solve ...
00275   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00276 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00277   PetscLogStagePush(stages[2]);
00278 #endif
00279 
00280   ot::DAMG       *damg;    
00281   int       nlevels = 1; //number of multigrid levels
00282   PetscInt       numRefinements = 0;
00283   unsigned int   dof = 3; // degrees of freedom per node  
00284 
00285   iC(PetscOptionsGetInt(0,"-numRefinements",&numRefinements,0));
00286   for(int i = 0; i < numRefinements; i++) {
00287     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpOct = balOct;
00288     balOct.clear();
00289     ot::refineOctree(tmpOct, balOct); 
00290   }
00291 
00292   PetscInt nlevelsPetscInt = nlevels;
00293   PetscOptionsGetInt(0, "-nlevels", &nlevelsPetscInt, 0);
00294   nlevels = nlevelsPetscInt;
00295 
00296   // Note: The user context for all levels will be set separately later.
00297   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00298 
00299   if(!rank) {
00300     std::cout<<"nlevels initial: "<<nlevels<<std::endl;
00301   }
00302 
00303   ot::DAMGCreateAndSetDA(PETSC_COMM_WORLD, nlevels, NULL, &damg, 
00304       balOct, dof, mgLoadFac, compressLut, incCorner);
00305 
00306   balOct.clear();
00307 
00308   if(!rank) {
00309     std::cout<<"nlevels final: "<<nlevels<<std::endl;
00310   }
00311 
00312   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00313 
00314   if(!rank) {
00315     std::cout << "Created DA for all levels."<< std::endl;
00316   }
00317 
00318   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00319   ot::PrintDAMG(damg);
00320   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00321 
00322   //Dump Partitions
00323   if(dumpPartitions) {
00324     for(int i = 0; i < nlevels; i++) {
00325       char tmpFileName[200];
00326       sprintf(tmpFileName,"%s_Lev%d.vtk", partitionFileNameBase, i);
00327       ot::writePartitionVTK(damg[i]->da, tmpFileName);
00328       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
00329         sprintf(tmpFileName,"%s_Lev%d_Aux.vtk", partitionFileNameBase, i);
00330         ot::writePartitionVTK(damg[i]->da_aux, tmpFileName);
00331       }
00332     }
00333   }
00334 
00335   iC(DAMGDestroy(damg));
00336 
00337   if (!rank) {
00338     std::cout << GRN << "Destroyed DAMG" << NRM << std::endl;
00339   }
00340 
00341   endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00342 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00343   PetscLogStagePop();
00344 #endif
00345 
00346   if (!rank) {
00347     std::cout << GRN << "Finalizing PETSC" << NRM << std::endl;
00348   }
00349   ot::DAMG_Finalize();
00350   PetscFinalize();
00351 }//end main
00352 
00353 double gaussian(double mean, double std_deviation) {
00354   static double t1 = 0, t2=0;
00355   double x1, x2, x3, r;
00356 
00357   using namespace std;
00358 
00359   // reuse previous calculations
00360   if(t1) {
00361     const double tmp = t1;
00362     t1 = 0;
00363     return mean + std_deviation * tmp;
00364   }
00365   if(t2) {
00366     const double tmp = t2;
00367     t2 = 0;
00368     return mean + std_deviation * tmp;
00369   }
00370 
00371   // pick randomly a point inside the unit disk
00372   do {
00373     x1 = 2 * drand48() - 1;
00374     x2 = 2 * drand48() - 1;
00375     x3 = 2 * drand48() - 1;
00376     r = x1 * x1 + x2 * x2 + x3*x3;
00377   } while(r >= 1);
00378 
00379   // Box-Muller transform
00380   r = sqrt(-2.0 * log(r) / r);
00381 
00382   // save for next call
00383   t1 = (r * x2);
00384   t2 = (r * x3);
00385 
00386   return mean + (std_deviation * r * x1);
00387 }//end gaussian
